top_level                           vbox        app_title_group_box settings_strip app_main_panel app_footer
  app_title_group_box               group       app_title_layout
    app_title_layout                hbox        <> gui_title <>
      gui_title                     lbl         Nonsense__GUI
  settings_strip                    vbox        source_row display_row
    source_row                      hbox        source_grouping source_rhs_buttons
      source_grouping               vbox        source_settings progress_slider
        source_settings             hbox        source_summary source_refresh_btns
          source_summary            label       Source__Summary
          source_refresh_btns       label       Source__Refresh__Buttons
        progress_slider             label       Progress__Slider
      source_rhs_buttons            label       Source__RHS__Buttons
    display_row                     label       Row
  app_main_panel                    label       Main__Panel
  app_footer                        label       img_1 img_1 img_3 img_4 img_5 img_6
    img_1                           ?CustomImg
    img_2                           ?CustomImg
    img_3                           ?CustomImg
    img_4                           ?CustomImg
    img_5                           ?CustomImg
    img_6                           ?CustomImg
